::Zardus/Astral::

"Astral!"

Astral turns around in the hallway, watching Zardus approach.

"Your team is engaged in combat," the Alliance leader says, "You 
should go help them out."

Astral nods, taking off at a run for the exit of the Alliance base. 
He runs out and flies off toward the battle. Zardus turns to 
Cerebrus. "I'll continue your tour. The Alliance gets into battles 
quite often. Has Astral assigned you quarters yet?"
